# Pull Request

## Summary

Describe the change and the problem it solves.

## Screenshots

If UI changes, include before/after.

## Type of change

- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Fix
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Docs

## How to test

Steps to validate.

## Checklist

- [ ] Builds locally (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Lints/format passes
- [ ] Docs updated (`docs/*`, API/WS schemas if needed)
- [ ] No sensitive data added
